title: post facturacion procesar listados with valid excel file
description: Test the POST /facturacion/procesar-listados/ endpoint with a valid Excel file to verify that the system processes the list correctly, returns a preview, validation summary, and fuzzy match suggestions.

title: post facturacion procesar listados with confirmation
description: Test the POST /facturacion/procesar-listados/ endpoint with confirm=true parameter to verify that the system persists the records successfully after preview and validation.

title: get facturacion dashboard with valid session
description: Test the GET /facturacion/ endpoint with a valid authenticated session to verify that the dashboard HTML page is returned successfully.

title: get principal departamentos with authorization
description: Test the GET /principal/api/departamentos/ endpoint with valid authorization to verify that the list of departments is returned as JSON.

title: get principal municipios filtered by departamento id
description: Test the GET /principal/api/municipios/ endpoint with a valid departamento_id parameter and authorization to verify that the list of municipalities filtered by the department is returned.

title: get nutricion menus with authorization
description: Test the GET /nutricion/api/menus/ endpoint with valid authorization to verify that the list of menus with metadata and nutrient totals is returned.

title: get nutricion ingredientes filtered by menu id
description: Test the GET /nutricion/api/ingredientes/ endpoint with a valid menu_id parameter and authorization to verify that the list of ingredients and gramajes for the specified menu is returned.
